post.summary: Create a new empty lighting system.

get.summary: Download a packed lighting system to a file with the specified name or as json string.
get.description:
If the Accept header is set to "application/octet-stream" the request result will be a *.lightingsystemx file.
curl -X GET "http://localhost:5006/avx-lightingsystem/v1/lightingsystems/a91c4485-3019-4a14-b3ea-3af17654f8e6/packed?fileName=test" -H "accept: application/octet-stream"
If the Accept header is set to "application/json" the request result will be a json string.
curl -X GET "http://localhost:5006/avx-lightingsystem/v1/lightingsystems/a91c4485-3019-4a14-b3ea-3af17654f8e6/packed" -H "accept: application/json"

parameters.name: lightingSystemIdentifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the lighting system in the library.

schema.description: Identifier of the lighting system in the library.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: Desired name for the packed lighting system file.

schema.description: Desired name for the packed lighting system file.

parameters.name: lightingSystemIdentifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the lighting system containing all the projectors.

schema.description: Identifier of the lighting system containing all the projectors.

parameters.name: lightingSystemIdentifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the lighting system in which the projector will be created.

schema.description: Identifier of the lighting system in which the projector will be created.

post.description:
If the Accept header is set to "application/octet-stream" the request input will be a *.lightingsystemx file.
curl -X GET "http://localhost:5006/avx-lightingsystem/v1/lightingsystems/a91c4485-3019-4a14-b3ea-3af17654f8e6/packed?fileName=test" -H "accept: application/octet-stream"
If the Accept header is set to "application/json" the request input will be a json string.
curl -X GET "http://localhost:5006/avx-lightingsystem/v1/lightingsystems/a91c4485-3019-4a14-b3ea-3af17654f8e6/packed" -H "accept: application/json"

fileName.description: Name of the packed lighting system file to upload.
Name of the packed lighting system file to upload.
